experience: You and Shay both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Ed Nusbaum, and 53 others

Through consulting engagements, CEO/Owner Forums and executive coaching Shift.Consulting works with companies, start-ups, non-profits and investors to make evaluations and provide assistance in the development and implementation of corporate strategy, organizational change, leadership development, marketing, cultural shifts and funding.  As an Executive Consultant, Shay and her team work with CEOs, Sr. Executive and leaders to support their professional development, optimize team dynamics and achieve desired results for growth and expansion.  In its early formation, the company created and built of one of the first digital media companies dedicated to branded entertainment, and video distribution network for original online content, the company shifted into high level consultancy and executive coaching in 2012.  The company created/developed the Daily Dish franchises for client SheKnows.com,  Created and executed branded entertainment campaigns and reality video programming for major consumer packaged good brands such as P&G and General Mills.   Overall efforts resulted in a new multimillion dollar business for SheKnows.com positioning them to be one of the top three internet networks for women. The company has created, produced  and managed  branded entertainment, go to market strategies, business development programs for more than 200 brands and privately held companies.  Client engagements include:  Omedix, McKesson, NDCHealth, EmpowHER, Arizona Interscholastic Association (AIAPreps265), GBS, 3Fi, Secure Care Technologies, Phoenix Country Day School, RTIR

As CEO of Omedix, a digital health company, grew revenue by more than 50% year over year.    Raised additional capital to fund product development efforts.  Renegotiated agreements to improve profitability. Restructured organization to improve bottom line.   Through collaborative efforts, drove purpose and value of Omedix on behalf of all stakeholders including physician-clients, consumers, investors and colleagues.
Chandler, Arizona, Hillsboro, OR & Santa Clara, CA

Board member - Advised CEO on marketing, channel development, channel management and exit strategies, provided ongoing guidance until the eventual sale of the company to Eclipsys (acquired by Allscripts).

Delivered a 500%+ revenue increase through effective management of all functional areas (finance, legal, HR) of the Physician Business Unit of NDC Health, a publicly-held company with annual revenues of $450 million. Directed/managed all business operations of the unit including sales, marketing, product management, development, quality assurance, client support and channel management.  Developed new revenue opportunities across multiple business units. Hired and developed expert management team of 10 direct reports, with responsibility for 110-190 employees, and a distribution network of 1800 dealers. Grew business unit from $10 million to $56 million within three years and drove profitability to more than 30% while integrating three acquired businesses. Spearheaded a complete restructure of the distribution channel, culling dead weight and renegotiating contracts, resulting in a positive impact on the P&L.  Integrated three separately acquired businesses into one business unit, eliminating duplication and added cost. Restructured the unit into functional areas across all business segments, reducing full time equivalents from 190+ to less than 125 while maintaining product integrity and client satisfaction.  Collaborated on industry committees to lobby Washington regarding electronic prescribing standards and electronic medical records.
SELF provided technical training and microlending to women and minorities creating economic empowerment and self employment opportunities.

summary: Creative, high-energy, marketing-oriented General Manager, C-Suite Executive, & Consultant.  Dynamic, charismatic leader able to inspire, engage and bring out the best in clients, teams and partners. Track record of increasing profitability and delivering continuous improvement through strategic clarity, dynamic team building and organizational health initiatives. Achieves outstanding performance by establishing clear vision and cultivating a bold team culture that creates trust and ignites passion. Experienced in leading major creative projects, programs, and initiatives from planning through execution, based on measurable business objectives. Specialties: Executive Coaching and Consulting, General Management, Healthcare IT, Digital Media, Integrative Marketing & Communications, Business Development, Sales Mgmt, Strategic Planning, Branded Entertainment, P&L Management,  Startups, Turnarounds, Market Analysis, Budget Planning, Business Modeling, Team Leadership,  Client Relations, Capital Acquisition, Public Speaking, Branding, Online Media Advertising, Social Media, Television, Reality Television & Digital Programming, Campaign Integration, Brand Ambassador, Media Coaching,
